Team fortress 2 is my favorite game. I was losing hope when the Meet your Match updated happened and there wasn't a major update for four hundred days. I still played and hoped the game would get better. The day I am writing this, the pyro update happened and completly restored my hope in this amazing game. Some people hated the update, but I don't mind it. There are still many problems to fix, but the update is a step in the right direction in mt opinion.

TF2 is a good game to me because is a very original idea but what makes the game special is that you can pick your own class and each one is different and use it in battle online. what I really like about tf2 is that you dont have to be skilled to be good at it beacause each class can take a deffierent type of skill that you might like.

Wow, so much to say but let me summarize

This beautiful example of a free to play first person shooter has its downfalls, but other than that the core gameplay is fantastic 

Let me explain,

First, each class has a unique role, and not that similar to other games.

Is there a game where you can play as a double jumping, shotgunning, fast, lightweight character as the Scout? 

Of course each class has its strengths and its weaknesses. But there are a whole lot of items that can change its classes role or way of gameplay!

There are also many just basic ways of playing each class and tactics. Like the Soldiers and Demoman's  Explosive jumping? Or maybe Demoman's Knight Capability? And there is SMG Sniper and much more!

Pro's:
Never gets old 
New tactics
Fun gamemodes such as Man VS Machine, x10, Randomizer, Saxton Hale, Freak Fortress, and Dodgeball.
New updates to look forward to.
Can run on low powered pc's

Cons:
Somethings are behind a paywall
Discrimination from other players if you dont have cosmetic items
Infrequent updates (TALKING TO YOU VALVE)
Some unbalanced weapons
Can get annoying at times.


TL:DR If you have space on your computer, and want to have some fun, Pick this game up!



Edit: Pyro/ Jungle Inferno update just came out, this is the first major update in 2017. I do think there are some changes to be made.

1. Dragons breath op, nerf it to only 20 shots
2. If you have the gas can and phlog, the meters over lap on each other (with default hud)

In my opinion this is the greatest team based, FPS experience you'll ever find. The characters just give off an amazing amount of charm with both their designs and voice lines. There's a huge variety of weapons and cosmetics (ESPECIALLY hats), there's taunts, most of them being made by the community which is great. A lot of gamemodes too, and the variety gets even bigger when you throw community servers into the mix.

Unfortunately there's been a big bot problem, though you can avoid a lot of bots if you play during a certain time of day. (As of writting this review our lord and saviour Gaben stated in an interview that they ARE aware of the bot problems, and that they have a solution in the works as well as more updates to the game so that's good!).

All in all I'd say this is one of my favourite games of all time, and definitely my favourite online gaming experince, though with the recent bot problems the quality of the game suffers a bit.

The score I'd give the game (with the bot crisis in mind) is a great 8/10
